header.title: Embedding in a Java application (using the JavaBean API)

section.title: Introduction
section.p: Normally, you will configure the barcode generators using XML as described on the Barcode XML page. Some people prefer using JavaBeans instead of XML. Here's how to use that API.
section.note: If you work with the Bean API you don't need avalon-framework.jar in your classpath.

section.title: Basic steps
section.p: The steps necessary to create barcodes using JavaBeans is similar to the steps using XML:
